Craft 1 bucket: 2) Craft a bucket using the crafting table.
Craft 2 chest: 2) Craft 2 chests using the crafting table.
Kill 2 cow: 1) Perceive and go near the cow.
Kill 2 pigs: 1) Teleport and search for pigs in different directions
Kill a llama: 1) Perceive and teleport near the llama
Mine 1 dirt blocks: 1) Perceive and go near the dirt block
Mine 1 jungle_log: 1) Perceive and go near the jungle_log.

Mine 1 sand and Smelt: 1) Perceive and go near the sand block.
3) Place a furnace in front of the bot.
4) Smelt the sand in the furnace.
Mine 1 stone: 1) Perceive and teleport near the stone block.
Mine 2 dirt blocks: 1) Teleport and approach the dirt block in pic3.
Mine 2 jungle_log: 1) Teleport near the jungle logs in pic1, pic2, or pic3.
Mine 2 oak_log: 1) Perceive and teleport near the oak log at distance 11.51.
Mine 2 oak_log and craft 2 oak_planks: 1) Teleport and approach the oak log at (10.12, 10.61) in pic1.

Mine 2 sand: 1) Teleport near the sand block in pic1 or pic2.

Mine 3 stone: 1) Perceive and go near the stone block
Mine 4 dirt blocks: 1) Teleport to the dirt block in pic1

Mine 4 jungle_log: 1) Perceive and teleport near the jungle log in pic4.
Mine 4 oak_log: 1) Perceive and teleport near the oak logs.
Mine 4 oak_log and craft 4 oak_planks: 1) Teleport to a nearby location with oak logs.

Mine 4 sand: 1) Perceive and teleport near the sand block.
Mine 4 stone: 1) Perceive and teleport near the stone block in pic1.
